disks.name: Moneyball
disks.description: Oakland As general manager Billy Beanes successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

disks.name: Horrible Bosses
disks.description: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

disks.name: Casino
disks.description: In Las Vegas, two best friends - a casino executive and a mafia enforcer - compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.
